mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM place p FULL OUTER JOIN blocking b ON(p.id = b.place_id) WHERE (NOT b.blocking_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sStartDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{sEndDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') OR b.blocking_date IS NULL) AND (p.latitude BETWEEN #{swLatitude} AND #{neLatitude}) AND (p.longitude BETWEEN #{swLongitude} AND #{neLongitude}) AND p.capacity >= #{capacity} ORDER BY p.id
